text:
tvA daqddhya~g~gRuShi#H puqtra I#dhEq atha#rvaNaH | 
vRuqtraqhaNa#M purandaqraM || 
tamu# tvA pAqthyO vRuShAq samI#dhE dasyuqhanta#maM | 
dhaqnaqM jaqya(gm) raNE#raNE || 
uqta bru#vantu jaqntavaq udaqgnirvRu#traqhA&ja#ni | 
dhaqnaqM jaqyO raNE#raNE || 
A ya(gm) hastEq na KAqdinaq(gm)q SiSu#M jAqtaM na biBra#ti | viqSAmaqgni(gg) sva#ddhvaqraM || 
pradEqvaM dEqvavI#tayEq Bara#tA vasuqvitta#maM | 
AsvE yOnauq ni ShI#datu || 
A - [  ]   35
